title: [Large-scale] Blended Learning Design in Science: Integrated Theory and Practice Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science theory knowledge and understanding of research methodologies
context.additional_context: Blended Design Optimized for Smartphone-Based Mobile Learning. Face-to-Face Sessions Occur Monthly as Intensive Workshops; Online Activities Operate via Daily Learning Management Systems

learning_goals: Learners can successfully perform the scientific problem-solving process in blended learning environments with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can understand the connectivity between online and face-to-face activities and apply at least three integration strategies.
Learners can analyze and evaluate complex scientific concepts with 90% accuracy using only mobile devices.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
